Detailed Description

Time performer.

Represents abstract object, which state depends on time.

Member Function Documentation

virtual void gpx::phy::ITimePerformer::update ( real_t  dt  )  [pure virtual]

Update.

Parameters:
dt time elapsed from last update. Value 0.0 and positives should be handled by implementing classes. Result of calling this method with negative value is undefined.

Implemented in gpx::phy2d::MaterialBody, gpx::phy2d::MovableObject, and gpx::phy2d::NewtonCollider.
